text: Patrick Segeja Chokala (3 March 1948 â€“ 6 November 2020) was a Tanzanian politician. He was the ambassador of the United Republic of Tanzania to the Russian Federation from 2002 to 2004. Chokala died of a heart attack in Dar es Salaam on 6 November 2020, aged 72. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Tanzanian politicians Category:Ambassadors to Russia Category:Tanzanian diplomats
title: Patrick Chokala
